MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH3 postcode area of Edinburgh, affecting properties in Rothesay Place and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12.53pm. Our engineers have arrived at the local substation]and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1.42pm on Wednesday 2nd December 2020.
